BugInstance.message: new com.secureai.config.SecurityConfig(JwtAuthenticationFilter) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into SecurityConfig.jwtAuthenticationFilter
com.secureai.dto.ErrorResponse.getErrors() may expose internal representation by returning ErrorResponse.errors
new com.secureai.dto.ErrorResponse(String, int, Instant, String, List) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into ErrorResponse.errors
com.secureai.dto.ErrorResponse.setErrors(List) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into ErrorResponse.errors
com.secureai.dto.ErrorResponse$ErrorResponseBuilder.errors(List) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into ErrorResponse$ErrorResponseBuilder.errors
new com.secureai.service.OllamaService(RestTemplateBuilder, ObjectMapper) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into OllamaService.objectMapper
